name: TERMINAL 64
description:
"Oh Peach... My sweet, sweet Peach... Mama Mia!"

Mario has retired from plumbing. He begins his epic trek into the desert. 

Reflecting on his past, he stumbles upon Sparrot's Tavern and takes a dip. 

You don't want to know what happens next...

Reviews

"You know I love experiences..." -- Cosmo D

"It's Electrifying!" -- Kotaku

"6.9 / 10" -- IGN

Credit where Credit is due. 

Case closed!
